alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A series of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Charlotte and central Halifax Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Halifax, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Boston... Halifax... Redoak... Clover... Nathalie... Scottsburg... and Hitesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
